description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThis bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W8485-23-SC02\/A dated 2022-09-19 with a closing of 2022-11-18 at 14:00 EST. FILE NUMBER: W8485-23-SC02\/BThis requirement is for the Department of National Defence (DND). Tendering Procedure: All interested suppliers may submit a bid Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest Cost per Point Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: NoNature of Requirement:This requirement is for the services of:One (1) Environmental Consultant.GSIN: R019F Consulting servicesNumber of Contracts: This bid solicitation is intended to result in the award of one (1) contract for two (2) years, plus three (3) irrevocable option years allowing Canada to extend the term of the Contract.Location of Work to be Performed:Region(s): National Capital RegionSpecific Location(s): 455 Boulevard de la Carri\u00e8re, Gatineau, QCSecurity RequirementSupplier Security Clearance required: SecretResource Security Clearance required: SecretSecurity Level required (Document Safeguarding): NoneEstimated Level of Effort:The estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 240 days per year.Estimated timeframe of contract - April 01 2023 to March 31 2025 plus three (3) irrevocable option years.Enquiries: Enquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the DND POC listed below.File Number: W8485-23-SC02\/BDND POC: Sharon SallyE-Mail: DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.caAll enquires must be submitted by email to the DND POC no later than five (5) calendar days before the bid closing date. Enquiries received after that time may not be answered.Change Order or Construction Change Proposal: NoInformation Item Report: NoProposal Pre-Screening Certificates: Nospecifications or special requirements: This RFP is seeking a Environmental Consultant premise: This consultant will be performing environmental assessment in National Capital Region.
duration_in_months: That is 2 years of contract that will perhaps be there for approximately 7 years.
